meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>soul</radical> will <radical>cross</radical> through your body and into the <radical>net</radical> of your <radical>clothes</radical> so that you'll be hit with <kanji>nostalgia</kanji> when you wear them again. Nostalgia for all the things that happened every single time you wore those clothes.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>nostalgia</kanji> ties <reading>knots</reading> (なつ) in your stomach and your chest. Even if the memories and feelings weren't particularly bad, there's something about the wistful feeling of nostalgia that knots up your insides.
